column2: "Welcome back, <%me>. Did you help out those newbies like I told you to?"
"Everyone starts at the bottom, and it's up to experienced members like you to help newbies in need. You got that?"
"...well, I think you're still a bit sketchy when watching you though."
"Well, at least you came back in one piece, <%me>. Thank goodness for small miracles."
